ComicInfo.Summary:
Part 1 of the new 4-part story "Joyride." South London's Hunger Hill housing estate has long been a breeding ground for violence, crime and drug abuse. But when the cycle of misery takes a distinct turn for the supernatural, John Constantine discovers there's something worse at play than mere social deprivation. Much worse...
Plus, don't miss a 7-page preview of the new Vertigo series UN-MEN!
Note: Production error on first printings, the speech balloons are missing from Page 21.
Vertical Comparison.The error is not major, since the story is strong visually to express what is happening. The next issue goes in to detail of the Possession that leaves this issue with a cliffhanger. Some readers may require the word bubbles, but the message on the phone and the pictures themselves should be enough.
Side by Side: Trade Paperback corrected version and monthly first printing with error.
